entry.title: Welcome
entry.summary: This blog post is a welcoming into HTMV's new documentation site + some general information.
entry.content:
This blog post is a welcoming into HTMV's new documentation site + some general information. If you wish to keep reading, please click on it.

As you may already know, HTMV is currently under heavy development. Expect out of date documentation, bugs, and not-so-good performance.

This will all improve as HTMV progressively stabilizes.

If you're here, thank you for your interesting in alpha testing HTMV. Both suggestions and contributions are greatly welcomed! You can open an issue on GitHub and from there we can talk.
